text: kya ve dharatee mein chale-phire nahin ki dekhate ki un logon ka kaisa parinaam hua jo unase pahale the? ve shakti mein unase adhik balavaan the aur unhonne dharatee ko upajaaya aur usase kaheen adhik use aabaad kiya jitana unhonne aabaad kiya tha. aur unake paas unake rasool pratyaksh pramaan lekar aae. phir allaah aisa na tha ki unapar zulm karata. kintu ve svayan hee apane aap par zulm karate the
